name: Dungeon of Risk
description:
This game was made for GM48(#20), which is a game jam that lasts for 48 hours with the theme of Risk and Reward.

It's a neato little rogue-like with a pretty generic title, I guess.

Features:

  • Procedurally generated dungeons
  • Fast-paced combat
  • Difficulty scaling
  • Player progression (levelling)
  • 3 diverse enemies
  • Dynamic camera with screenshake
  • Compass pointing towards exit
  • Explosive barrels
  • Some other cool stuff, I guess
